name: General Culinary 11 Quiz / Test | Food & Drink | 10 Questions

questions.text: What type of tea in Tibet and Mongolia was used as currency?
What is the Indonesian soya-cake cooked into thin layers called?
Vol-Au-Vent, 'flying in the wind' is what type of French delicacy?
What is hard, cow milk-cheese, found in Scotland, called?
Blini is a small type of pancake from what country?
What is the popular cake in Britain with 4 cakes:2 are pink, and the other 2 are yellow, stuck together with apricot jam?
What are the flatfish caught near France called?
What is the main staple during the Middle Ages?
What is the red-hot chilli paste used primarily in Morocco called?
What is the name of the Jollof rice eaten by the Senegalese people?
